teamInstructions.title: Team Instructions
teamInstructions.description: Configure global instructions that will be applied to all team conversations
teamInstructions.contentPlaceholder: Ex: Always be polite and casual. Respond in Portuguese...
teamInstructions.helpText: Global instructions will be automatically applied at the beginning of all team conversations in Chat.
teamInstructions.previewText: How instructions will appear to AI:

userInstructions.title: Personal Instructions
userInstructions.description: Configure how AI should behave specifically for you. These instructions take priority over team instructions.
userInstructions.contentPlaceholder: Type your personalized instructions for AI...
userInstructions.helpText: Your personal instructions will be automatically applied to all your AI interactions, overriding team instructions.

alerts.defaultModelInfo: The default model cannot be disabled. To disable, first set another model as default.

errors.cannotDisableDefault: Cannot disable the default model. Set another model as default first.
errors.atleastOneModel: At least one model must be active in the team.
errors.tokenRequired: Token not configured. Configure the provider token in the 'Access Tokens' section.
errors.modelNotFound: Model not available. Check if the provider token is configured.
errors.internalError: Internal server error. Check logs for more details.
errors.contactSupport: If the problem persists, please contact support with the technical details below.

api.Only the team owner can perform this act: Only the team owner can perform this action
api.You dont have permission to do this Cont: You don't have permission to do this. Contact a team administrator if you believe this is an error.

server.title: Server Error
server.subtitle: Something went wrong on our end
server.message: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Our team has been notified and is working to resolve the issue.

database.title: Database Connection Error
database.subtitle: Unable to connect to the database
database.message: We're having trouble connecting to our database. Please try again in a few moments.

serverCrash.title: Server Temporarily Unavailable
serverCrash.subtitle: The server is not responding
serverCrash.message: Our servers are temporarily unavailable. We're working to restore service as quickly as possible.

renderError.title: Page Loading Error
renderError.subtitle: Something went wrong while loading this page
renderError.message: We encountered an error while loading this page. This usually resolves itself automatically.
renderError.suggestion: Please try refreshing the page or going back to the previous page.

networkError.title: Connection Error
networkError.subtitle: Unable to connect to the server
networkError.message: Please check your internet connection and try again.

timeoutError.title: Request Timeout
timeoutError.subtitle: The request took too long to complete
timeoutError.message: The server didn't respond in time. Please try again.

maintenanceMode.title: Maintenance Mode
maintenanceMode.subtitle: We're performing scheduled maintenance
maintenanceMode.message: The system is temporarily unavailable while we perform maintenance. We'll be back shortly.

tips.title: What you can do:
tips.wait: Wait a few minutes and try again
tips.contact: Contact support if the problem persists
tips.different: Try a different browser or device

client.title: Something went wrong
client.subtitle: An unexpected error occurred
client.message: We're sorry for the inconvenience. Please try again.

chunkLoadError.title: Loading Error
chunkLoadError.subtitle: Failed to load application resources
chunkLoadError.message: Please refresh the page to reload the application.

hydrationError.title: Application Sync Error
hydrationError.subtitle: The application needs to be refreshed
hydrationError.message: Please refresh the page to restore normal operation.

recovery.title: Error Recovery
recovery.instructions: Please follow the instructions below to continue:

You cannot unlock tasks that are schedul: You cannot unlock tasks that are scheduled for after tomorrow end of day
Substitue the tasks of this turn with th: Substitue the tasks of this turn with the tasks from the calendar?
All data related to you will be permanen: All data related to you will be permanently lost and cannot be recovered
Permanently delete your account and all: Permanently delete your account and all your data
Wether or not this task is considered cr: Wether or not this task is considered critical, or important. You can choose to receive notifications about it on the <settings>settings</settings> page
Is this task considered critical or impo: Is this task considered critical or important?
Are you sure you want to delete this tas: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
It seems that there are some overlapping: It seems that there are some overlapping shifts
Are you sure you want to create a shift: Are you sure you want to create a shift anyways?
Are you sure you want to unlock this shi: Are you sure you want to unlock this shift?
There is no shift associated with this t: There is no shift associated with this task. It is recommended that you create a shift so it can be completed
This task is not associated with any of:
You do not have a shift active for this task. 
 We recommend you create one for better organization.
